weather_report:
Cottesloe basks in the unfettered embrace of serene, clear skies. Clear as the light refracting off the surface of glass, the azure above positively radiates in a resplendent light that can't help but soothe. Warming, kindly, it makes the very spirit of the day feel light; the sun is more a gentle whisper than a fiery shout. A UV index that, despite its measurement, is completely unobtrusive, only adds to the charm.

Between you, me, and the radiant sun overhead, the weather is nothing short of splendid. The calm of a peaceful afternoon filled with the soothing hum of everyday vibrancy. Unhurried, the day seems to luxuriate in its own glorious pace. One could just as easily slip into a light cotton shirt, letting the gentle warmth banter with your skin and opt for a stroll along the endless stretch of glistening sand. A good book, waiting to be perused under the charm of this sunlight, might be the companion you didn't know you needed. Moreover, the languid warmth suggests an unhurried pace - a day to sip on a cool, iced beverage, watching the waves lazily lapping over the beach might just be the antidote to the world's rush.
